56.eng-name: Fighting for the Cause of Allah (Jihaad)

hadiths.text: Narrated Jarir:Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) did not screen himself from me since my embracing Islam, and whenever he saw me he would receive me with a smile. Once I told him that I could not sit firm on horses. He stroke me on the chest with his hand and said, "O Allah! Make him firm and make him a guiding and a rightly guided man

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ لاَ يَثْبُتُ عَلَى الْخَيْلِ
chapter.eng-name: Whosoever is unable to sit firm on a horse
